title: My ip is gone....someone else was in my acc......HELP
body: I just hited today.....yesterday i had 4356 ip and today i have 629 with 2 more champions......(Ornn and ivarn)

replies.body: If you don't remember buying those champions, it sounds like someone else might have access to your account. I suggest hitting up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can to make sure it's resecured. We should be able to help repair any damage as long as we can see the compromiser did it without your permission.
